posts.postText:
TTT_forest_Final
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=125612

>> Here's the 'story'' behind the map:

The terrorists have completed their mission by derailing a train. However, they did it too early and now they are stuck in a forest surrounded by mountains. Why was the train derailed early? The heist was sabotaged by a group of traitors among them! Time will tell their fate...

- This is the first public release, the first two betas had too many errors.
- I have plans for underground caves in a future version.
- Might add a skybox too.
- Thanks to ''Python Violator'' for inspiring me to make this.
- Thanks to ''Blueberry_Pie'' for the LDR skybox fix.
- Thanks to all the people who helped me beta test earlier.

Changelog:

- Made it sexier
- Added a couple of platforms with ladders to places
- Fixed a few minor things
- Completely remade the spectator course, should be fun now 
- Fixed up the skybox a bit
- Fixed floating trees (lol)
- Some other shit I can't remember.

Also, a trailer:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIUzMHrz8as
Honestly I would rather just have this map removed, the prop killing is ridiculous and the high amount of explosive barrels cause a lot of rdm.

>> Honestly I would rather just have this map removed, the prop killing is ridiculous and the high amount of explosive barrels cause a lot of rdm.  Yes, especially at like the early hours of the morning the trolls come on and just shoot the barrels no matter who's near them

*ahem* I dont think 'trolls'' and ''propkilling'' should be a reason to remove a map, there  is  a reason we have moderators.
 Edit:  Yes, I support this map!

>> *ahem* I dont think 'trolls'' and ''propkilling'' should be a reason to remove a map, there  is  a reason we have moderators.
 Edit:  Yes, I support this map! 

+support because of this statement

i was online when the creator jumped online and told us about this
ujelly? :D
